spetml:page.title: About Solar Logistix
spetml:page.sl:description: Solar Logistix has been providing solar services for over six weeks. With dozens of satisfied customers, our goal is to elevate our service and to shine above the competition.

section.p: Solar Logistix has been providing solar services for over six weeks. With dozens of satisfied customers, our goal is to elevate our service and to shine above the competition.
We are based in East Hampshire. Click here to contact us with any questions you may have.
Solar Logistix is currently looking to expand its sales staff. We are also looking for skilled astronauts who are willing to travel to the sun. Click here to contact us for more information.
